metadata.name: 2117 - Citizenship #1
metadata.description: The 2117 citizenship comes with a full set of unique benefits. Citizens will be called Bedu as an ode to the Bedouins, the semi-nomadic people who survive life in a harsh desert environment and are celebrated for their hospitality. To be a Bedu in 2117 means you are ready for the tough journey and settling of a hostile planet, while you embrace all those that come with you. \\n\\nCITIZENS (BEDU) BENEFITS: \\n\\n • Lifetime citizenship income (a % of the revenues made in 2117 get redistributed to the citizens as dividend on a quarterly basis). \\n\\n • Free drops across the 2117 seasons. \\n\\n • Contribution into building the different elements in the 2117 world.
